resources.string: Bluetooth permission not granted. Please click button and you will be asked again about this permission.
Bluetooth permission permanently declined. It is necessary to connect with thermometers. In case of not accepting this permission, you will not be able to connect with your thermometers.
Location permission not granted. It is necessary to scan and connect with Bluetooth devices. Please click button and you will be asked again about this permission.
Location permission permanently declined. It is necessary to connect with thermometers. In case of not accepting this permission, you will not be able to connect with your thermometers.
Please click \'+\' icon on the status-bar right corner to search for devices.
Unexpected error occurred, please try again.
Unexpected error occurred during connecting to the device. Please restart application and try again.
Thermometer name must not be empty!
